title: Gray Zone
subtitle: "Between black and white, I choose the gray zone"
description: One human chose to stand between androids and humans, not because he was persuaded, but because he had seen the truth with his own eyes.
synopsis:
Lu Qingxian left the organization he belonged to. It wasn't a dramatic break, it was a long, lucid awakening.

He spent months tracking a satellite with abnormal orbital parameters and found three androids and a name: ESAP. Then he said one sentence: "What I can do is build a bridge between you and the outside world."

This is the story of that bridge. And the story of another person standing on it.
